mapper.insert: insert into member(mid,mpassword,mname,memail,social) values(#{mid},#{mpassword},#{mname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{memail, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{social})
mapper.select: select c1.mid,c1.mpassword,c1.mname,c1.memail,c1.social,c2.role_set from member c1 join role_set c2 on c1.mid = c2.mid where c1.mid = #{mid} and c1.social=#{social}
